channel.title: Windows 8 with Minecraft
channel.description:
I am currently on Vacation and I took my laptop with me, I decided to install Windows 8 on it so I could try it out while I was on vacation. I installed all my drivers without a problem, I can load everything... Except minecraft. I looked around and there were quite a few people who had this same problem, and they all were given dead-end help. I did see they said install the windows 7 drivers, so I did. I was given no success.
This is what happens when I load minecraft.
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/3493rjd.png[/img]
I have played Minecraft on this computer before. I won't say it was 'great' but I did average around 30fps.
Any advice, or ideas?

item.title: Windows 8 with Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Alright, I figured out how to fix it!

9zw1fr.png1366×768

I am going to explain how I fixed this problem in-case anyone else has this problem.

So, open up your command prompt, and type dxdiag.exe and when that opens click display.

It will say the name of your Graphics Card, or chip, whatever you have. Type that into google, and download the Windows 7 Driver, if they do not have a Windows 8 driver available. It may take a few moments, just download and install it. When Windows 8 loads drivers it just gets the basic ones, the ones that are compatible, not the ones that are the best choice. I need to do this with my sound driver now. I have now realized how bad my sound is now.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 8 with Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:8, topic:466336”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=579918.msg4151085#msg4151085 date=1352436547]
http://news.cnet.com/8301-10797_3-57522484-235/minecraft-maker-says-he-wont-certify-his-game-for-windows-8/

OT: op check your graphics card(or integrated graphics) manufactures website and check for windows 8 compatible drivers…
[/quote]

Yeah I read that. I will look into my manufactures website and see about windows 8 drivers.[/quote]

I just installed Windows 8, and I had a problem with minecraft too. I eventually came across the right driver, so I just advise you to keep looking.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 8 with Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

CNET – 28 Sep 12

Minecraft maker says he won't certify his game for Windows 8

Markus "Notch" Persson says he wants Microsoft to stop "trying to ruin the PC as an open platform."

OT: op check your graphics card(or integrated graphics) manufactures website and check for windows 8 compatible drivers…

item.title: Windows 8 with Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:5, topic:466336”]http://www.realtech-vr.com/glview/

Try running that to see if OpenGL is working properly.[/quote]

Download didn’t work, tried it for like 10 minutes.

omgilikepie:

Are you using the same launcher you used before?

Yeah, I even downloaded a new one. Still nothing. I never used OpenGL while playing minecraft before.
